question: What is the meaning of my name! What is the correct transalation!My name is BAQIR. Jazakallah
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Baaqir (Arabic) - from the root word, 'Baqara' meaning to open, widen,
broaden, make spacious, etc.

Baaqir, being the active form when used as a title or name could mean,
hospitable (makes spacious for guests), etc. when used as an attribute it
could also mean possessing wide knowledge and great wealth.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
